es.uah.cc.ie.ehr2ont.translator
Class Translator

java.lang.Object
  es.uah.cc.ie.ehr2ont.translator.Translator
Direct Known Subclasses:
CodedTextTranslator, CodePhraseTranslator, CountTranslator, DateTranslator, ElementTranslator, EvaluationTranslator, EventTranslator, HistoryTranslator, ItemStructTranslator, ObservationTranslator, OpenEHR2OwlTranslator, OrdinalTranslator, QuantityTranslator
public abstract class Translator
extends java.lang.Object

This is the root class for translators’ tree. It generalizes naming process for OWL classes, and defines Translate() method that should be implemented by all translators.

Constructor Summary

          Guarantees that “co” node is completely translated.

Constructor Detail

Translator

public Translator(org.openehr.am.archetype.Archetype arc,
                  UAHJenaOWLModel model,
                  org.openehr.am.archetype.constraintmodel.CObject co,
                  Translator superTranslator)
Guarantees that “co” node is completely translated. To accomplish all inner nodes translation, corresponding translators are built and invoked before the end of this method.

Parameters:
arc - Points to the input archetype object that will be translated
model - Points to an OWL ontology that will store traslation results
co - Defines next node to be translated in the adl hierarchy
superTranslator - Back pointer to super Node translator.
